rule.name: clang-analyzer-osx.coreFoundation.containers.OutOfBounds
rule.description: Checks for index out-of-bounds when using ``CFArray`` API.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-osx.coreFoundation.containers.PointerSizedValues
rule.description: Warns if ``CFArray``, ``CFDictionary``, ``CFSet`` are created with non-pointer-size values.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-security.FloatLoopCounter
rule.description: Warn on using a floating point value as a loop counter (CERT: FLP30-C, FLP30-CPP).

rule.name: clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.UncheckedReturn
rule.description: Warn on uses of functions whose return values must be always checked (setuid, setgid, seteuid, setegid, setreuid, setregid).

rule.name: clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.getpw
rule.description: Warn on uses of the ``getpw`` function.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.gets
rule.description: Warn on uses of the ``gets`` function.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.mkstemp
rule.description: Warn when ``mktemp``, ``mkstemp``, ``mkstemps`` or ``mkdtemp`` is passed fewer than 6 X's in the format string.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.mktemp
rule.description: Warn on uses of the ``mktemp`` function.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.rand
rule.description: Warn on uses of inferior random number generating functions (only if ``arc4random`` function is available).

rule.name: clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.strcpy
rule.description: Warn on uses of the ``strcpy`` and ``strcat`` functions.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-security.insecureAPI.vfork
rule.description: Warn on uses of the vfork function.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-unix.API
rule.description: Check calls to various UNIX/POSIX functions (open, pthread_once, calloc, malloc, realloc, alloca).

rule.name: clang-analyzer-unix.Malloc
rule.description: Check for memory leaks, double free, and use-after-free and offset problems involving ``malloc``.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-unix.MallocSizeof
rule.description: Check for dubious ``malloc``, ``calloc`` or ``realloc`` arguments involving sizeof.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-unix.MismatchedDeallocator
rule.description: Check for mismatched deallocators (e.g. passing a pointer allocating with ``new`` to ``free()``).

rule.name: clang-analyzer-unix.cstring.BadSizeArg
rule.description: Check the size argument passed to ``strncat`` for common erroneous patterns. Use -Wno-strncat-size compiler option to mute other strncat-related compiler warnings.

rule.name: clang-analyzer-unix.cstring.NullArg
rule.description: Check for null pointers being passed as arguments to C string functions (strlen, strnlen, strcpy, strncpy, strcat, strncat, strcmp, strncmp, strcasecmp, strncasecmp).
